bibl.title: Rock Sawing at a Roman Diorite Quarry, Wadi Umm Shegilat, Egypt.

Interdisciplinary Studies on Ancient Stone. ASMOSIA V. Proceedings of the Fifth International Conference [Association for the Study of Marble and Other Stones in Antiquity], Museum of Fine Arts, Boston 1998

bibl.seg: HARRELL James A. and V. Max BROWN, Rock Sawing at a Roman Diorite Quarry, Wadi Umm Shegilat, Egypt.
